desc: Natural Tampons, Towels, Liners and Wipes. Pure 100% non-GMO cotton without harmful chemicals. Protect yourself from irritations with our gentle, healthy, and safe period products. Gentle on your body and on our earth, you can feel good about the naturally pure cotton used in every Veeda product.

layout.text: Care For You, Care for the Planet
Thoughtfully Designed, Kinder in Everything We Do
